description.english: Any character reaches Level 5 in the adventure
description.schinese: 任意角色在冒险中达到5级
description.tchinese: 任意角色在冒險中達到5級

description.english: Any character reaches Level 10 in the adventure
description.schinese: 任意角色在冒险中达到10级
description.tchinese: 任意角色在冒險中達到10級

description.english: Any character reaches Level 20 in the Bluestone Beach
description.schinese: 任意角色在青石海岸中达到20级
description.tchinese: 任意角色在青石海岸中達到20級

description.english: Any character reaches Level 40 in Tianli Grassland
description.schinese: 任意角色在天离草原中达到40级
description.tchinese: 任意角色在天離草原中達到40級

description.english: Any character reaches Level 60 in Ancient Wasteland
description.schinese: 任意角色在上古荒原中达到60级
description.tchinese: 任意角色在上古荒原中達到60級

description.english: Any character can survive for 1 minute in the adventure
description.schinese: 任意角色在冒险中生存1分钟
description.tchinese: 任意角色在冒險中生存1分鐘

description.english: Any character can survive for 5 minutes in the adventure
description.schinese: 任意角色在冒险中生存5分钟
description.tchinese: 任意角色在冒險中生存5分鐘

description.english: Any character can survive for 10 minutes in the adventure
description.schinese: 任意角色在冒险中生存10分钟
description.tchinese: 任意角色在冒險中生存10分鐘

description.english: Any character can survive for 15 minute in the adventure
description.schinese: 任意角色在冒险中生存15分钟
description.tchinese: 任意角色在冒險中生存15分鐘

description.english: Equip 6 different weapons at the same time
description.schinese: 同时装备6个不同的武器
description.tchinese: 同時裝備6個不同的武器

description.english: Get 6000G at one time during the adventure
description.schinese: 冒险中一次性获得6000灵铢
description.tchinese: 冒險中一次性獲得6000靈銖

description.english: Defeat Gongsun Yin at Bluestone Beach
description.schinese: 在青石海岸击败公孙寅
description.tchinese: 在青石海岸擊敗公孫寅

description.english: Find the village head's leather drum
